head.title: 在離岸之前
head.description: Hi there. Before having fun with Phenomic, be sure to read (or at least pretend to) the documentation : Setup Getting Started Usage FAQ…

body:
Hi there.

Before having fun with Phenomic, be sure to read (or at least pretend to) the documentation :

  • Setup
  • Getting Started
  • Usage
  • FAQ

Also take a look to existing websites that use Phenomic, some projects share their source code!

Built with React .

You may want to take a look to the 404.html.

If you want to adjust those, directly adjust them in src/layouts/.
